name: Lil' Jimbo's Candy Run
description:
Lil' Jimbo's Candy Run is an (extremely) short platformer where you play as Jimbo, a child having a dream about collecting as much candy as he can while avoiding the candy-based monsters and the one terrifying cavity monster of his dreams.

Noteable Changes: Each enemy has a unique trait, various different types of pickups available, one hidden area, one boss monster with a custom audio cue and death effect
